section.title: catagories
section.para: defining the alternative types of loss model (refer to IAHS papers)

section.title: emperical
section.para: rainfall excess models and variations (IL CL, PL)

section.title: simple
section.para: infiltration based models (hortonian, green-ampt, AWB loss model)

section.title: process
section.para: detailed hydropheric zone models typically using richardson equation

section.title: Conceptual aspects of alternative models
section.para: Using the loss parameters away from it's theoretical basis for tuning of models, this creates a regional flood model. You can then no longer use that model to extrapolate to an unknown situation.
